text: The Slovenia men's national 3x3 team is the 3x3 basketball team representing Slovenia in international men's competitions, organized and run by the Slovenian Basketball Federation. ==Senior Competitions== ===Performance at World Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year ! !width=25px| !width=25px| !width=25px| |- | 2012 || Last 16||6||4||2 |- | 2014 || Last 16||6||4||2 |- style="background:#c96;" | 2016|| 3rd||7||6||1 |- | 2017 || 4th||7||5||2 |- style="background:#c96;" | 2018|| 3rd||7||5||2 |- | 2019 || TBD||0||0||0 |} ===Performance at Europe Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font- size=85%" |- !rowspan=2|Year !colspan=4|Final tournament |- ! !width=25px| !width=25px| !width=25px| |- |-bgcolor="#C0C0C0" | 2014||2nd ||6||5||1 |- |-bgcolor=gold | 2016||1st ||5||5||0 |-bgcolor="#C0C0C0" | 2017||2nd ||5||4||1 |- style="background:#c96;" | 2018||3rd ||5||4||1 |- | 2019||TBD ||0||0||0 |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website *FIBA profile Category:Slovenia national basketball team 3 Category:National 3x3 basketball teams
